user.name: Eliezer Yudkowsky ⏹️
user.description: The original AI alignment person.  Missing punctuation at the end of a sentence means it's humor.  If you're not sure, it's also very likely humor.

fullText: I'm confused about why ChatGPT-4o-Crazymaker is still active.  OpenAI can't foresee alignment issues in advance, but after the fact, I would've predicted they could patch out explicit psychosis induction.  I would've expected that patch to be incentivized by news stories.

A good trick to improve your chunks is to augment them with additional metadata.
